topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55afe1fe6368720a1e000c86#post_55afe1fe6368720a1e000c86

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55afe1ff6368720a47000bfa#post_55afe1ff6368720a47000bfa

"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55afe2486368720a1e000cf6#post_55afe2486368720a1e000cf6

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55afe27e6368720af10008e9#post_55afe27e6368720af10008e9

I had a Dream I was part of the fucking Star Fox team.

and every time I piloted my Arwing everything turned into a Star Fox Game prospective.

*AND IT WAS FUCKING HARD*

Imagine playing a Bullet hell version of Star fox and the game prospective is still 3rd person so you cant SEE THE BULLETS.

~Funny thing though was it was really fun and I was pretty alright~

Also Fox was a hot shot and kept poking fun at Peppy for being old. Also for some reason we were in a car at one point.

Also one of the characters of Fourze was there and he was being held hostage and we had to save him? And when it was at that point everything started to look like City Trial from Kirby's Air ride almost only different? 

Like what the hell even happened?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55afdd046368720a4700049f#post_55afdd046368720a4700049f
Damn
I am so sorry for the lost of his father, and I feel bad that I didn't helped you and didn't noticed your post about your bf's dad.

I know how is losing someone that was close to you, someone that you cared a lot.
One of my aunts died one year ago due a blood clot and cancer. She was recovering from cancer actually, but due to high depression for the lost his husband and a divorce, she started smoking. After some months, she started to have pain in her stomach, but she didn't care. One week later, my mother and my other aunts "forced" her to go to the hospital. The doctor said that she had venous thrombosis. One month ago, after new year, she went to the hospital cause she couldn't handle the pain. She was there for two weeks.

12:58

It was very sudden.
I have never been so sad before.

My two grandfathers died too, but I never met the father of my dad and I was not very attached to the father of my mom.

You said your bf feel better, right?
That's good.
